Question
========
A survey was conducted among sociology students at EUR on students' attitudes toward methods theory. Thesis 1 was "methods theory is useful in the context of this study." This statement had to be answered on a 7-point Likert scale, where 1 = "totally disagree" and 7 = "totally agree." What percentage of students gave a score of 5 (somewhat agree)? Write the percentage (with 1 decimal place) in the answer box.

* Download**: [SPSS file](eur-descriptive-205-en-data.sav), [CSV file](eur-descriptive-205-en-data.csv)


Solution
========
The correct answer is 14.7.
